fix_description: Created BUG_EMAIL_NOTIFIER.py - sends HTML emails to fa.sha.man.mc@gmail.com when bugs are fixed. Beautiful HTML email template with bug details, fix description, affected files, and deployment status. Currently running in background monitoring for completed bugs.
